subject: Dear
body:
Dear
In view of your outstanding profile and location, I decided to write
to you. I have decided that I seek your assistance in a matters that
requires your urgent attention.
I'm Abu Usman from Afghanistan, and I am contacting you due to the
ongoing takeover by the Taliban in my country.
I need your urgent response to help me receive some funds for
Investment partnership with you in your country.
Your positive response will be highly appreciated.with the below information
A) Your Full Name,
B)Your Full Address,
C) Your Direct Cell Phone Number
D. Occupation
 As soon as I receive your response I will get back to you Asap.
Sincerely,
Abu Usman

subject: Re: Dear
body:
Hello Abu Usman,

Thank you for reaching out to me. It's really nice to hear from you. I'm sorry to hear about the situation in your country, it must be very difficult.

I'm interested in hearing more about this investment opportunity you mentioned. Could you please provide more details? What kind of investment are we talking about? How does it work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Concetta
